description:
Long days on trails provide enough challenges, don’t let light conditions be another "thing".

  • Fits medium faces best
  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material to keep you fog-free. Anti-fog lenses perform at their best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, anti-fog lenses are happiest stored in a warm, dry environment
  • Adjustable anti-slip nose pads and long grippy temples keep them in place and stick even better as your face gets wetter
  • TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 8-base lens curve provides face-hugging coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Rockwork Sunglasses - Unisex
